page.title: 06Village Hall, Prickwillow
page.content: Mr Stacey was a founder member and past Chairman of the Hall Committee. 'The Hall has been a very important facility of this Community although it is only booked for fifteen percent of the available time. Organisations like the{Church, the {Womans Institute}and the{Youth Club book it for their use. The Hall is also used for{Wedding {Receptions and Disco's. Only a small charge is made to cover the running costs. Elaborate repairs or improvements such as the Toilets recently are paid for by{fund raising {which all the Organisations}take part in. After the Building Contractor has left we do the painting excetera so we keep the costs down.
